name: Influencer in the City
description:
This project was made at part of UBC's MET program for the course ETEC565S by a team of masters students: AnnaMarie, Lynda, Patricia and Anneke.

This is a PC 2D RPG game about youth influence in the city, empowering players to reflect on the impact their decisions have on their community and themselves. Through engagement with their community and grassroots events, players will affect change.

What kind of influencer will you be?
